column2: VBI Vaccines, Inc. is a biopharmaceutical company, which engages in the development of vaccines for infectious disease and immuno-oncology. The company is headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts and currently employs 108 full-time employees. The firm's principal products include cytomegalovirus (CMV) Vaccine Candidate, enveloped Virus Like Particle (eVLP) Vaccine Platform and Lipid Particle Vaccine (LPV) Vaccine Platform. The firm is also engaged in the research and development (R and D) activity. The firm's subsidiaries includes Variation Biotechnologies (US), Inc. (VBI US) and Variation Biotechnologies Inc. (VBI Cda).
